Water andse: Using water and a small amount of baking soda or vinegar, you can create a natural cleaning solution that can be used for most cleaning tasks. This solution can be used to clean dishes, surfaces, and even clothes.
Essential oils: Certain essential oils, such as tea tree oil and lavender oil, have natural antibacterial and antifungal properties. You can use these oils to clean surfaces and kill germs.
DIY cleaning sprays: You can make your own cleaning sprays using natural ingredients such as lemon juice, vinegar, and baking soda. These sprays can be used to clean surfaces and kill germs.
Natural scrubs: You can make your own natural scrubs using ingredients such as baking soda, salt, and sugar. These scrubs can be used to clean dishes, surfaces, and even teeth.

Use sunlight: Sunlight has natural disinfecting properties. You can hang your clothes outside to dry and kill germs. Additionally, you can also use sunlight to clean surfaces by exposing them to direct sunlight for a few hours.
